abstract: The oil giant is evaluating technologies from seven companies. It is evaluating them for use at its facilities worldwide.
snippet: The oil giant is evaluating technologies from seven companies. It is evaluating them for use at its facilities worldwide.
lead_paragraph: The oil giant Chevron has transformed an old refinery site in California into a test bed for seven advanced photovoltaic solar technologies, which the company is evaluating for use at its facilities worldwide.
